text: 12.10: Lu 14.3Kandɨhañɨ kru mumɨŋga kɨyɨmi, kru kandɨhama kumamaka timu kɨmuhɨmu mɨŋga. Kru muvɨra kuyusɨhɨrata Jisasɨŋ nuŋandɨ miku ŋɨnɨŋ ndu kumaŋgɨmbañɨ tamɨmɨndaŋ vata kitɨhuta ambamu, Kru kandi naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ Avɨrɨkɨmuhɨmu Hɨvɨyɨ mɨŋavindamaharɨŋ vaha, mana mambaha mɨŋavindamaharɨŋ, vamu.
